class_notes: Privacy and data protection law are fundamental to many other practice areas and daily life including connected cars/fitness trackers, surveillance cameras/baby monitors, artificial intelligence and machine learning, ad tech/marketing, app development/gaming/VR, biometrics, location tracking, incident response/data breaches, M&A, international law/business and more.
course_description: Information Privacy and Security Law will focus on the primary legal and policy issues confronting practitioners in the area of information privacy and security today. The developments outlined above have challenged existing legal frameworks and have led to an array of new laws and regulations.
